ygData.subject: Re: Spell research
ygData.msgSnippet: What about the parchment and the quill? Are they needed? ... research.  There really wasn t much to it, put the two *right* runes in the Lexicon, hit combine,
ygData.messageBody:
What about the parchment and the quill? Are they needed?


At 02:44 PM 5/6/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: sdunn@...
>
>I have successfully made both Piller of fire and project lightning through
research. There really wasn't much to it, put the two *right* runes in the
Lexicon, hit combine, and get the message, you have successfully fasioned
these items into something new. Of course those two spells are worthless,
but hey; I researched something.
>
>Problem is that I have all the useful spells (including alot of useless
ones) for level 16 and 20, so right now I'm in rune collection mode for 24
and 29. I'm also looking for someone to get me above Below average in old
erudian. I saw someone auctioning that they will train up to excellent for
20pp (train 4 others for the more reasonable price for 5pp and I'll make it
back), didn't have enough. Such is life.
>
>For your information you can train up to your level + 1 in research. You
start off with 17 points after one training I beleive. After you level a
few times you can keep pumping points in there. I presume with the level
49 spells you will be failing alot.
>
>Fastus
>Level 21 Dark Elf Wizard
>The Rathe
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Join the Star Wars craze!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Set up your Star Wars list at ONElist.
>
